verses.verse: Now you shall gather<WH1413> yourself in troops,<WH1416> daughter<WH1323> of troops.<WH1416> He has laid<WH7760> siege<WH4692> against us.<WH5221> They will strike the judge<WH8199> of Israel<WH3478> with a rod<WH7626> on the cheek.<WH3895>

But you,<WH1035> Bethlehem Ephrathah,<WH672> being small<WH6810> among the clans<WH505> of Judah,<WH3063> out of you one will come forth<WH3318> to me that is to be ruler<WH4910> in Israel;<WH3478> whose goings forth<WH4163> are from of old,<WH6924> from everlasting.<WH3117>

Therefore he will abandon<WH5414> them until the time<WH6256> that she who is in labor<WH3205> gives birth.<WH3205> Then the rest<WH3499> of his brothers<WH251> will return<WH7725> to the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

He shall stand,<WH5975> and shall shepherd<WH7462> in the strength<WH5797> of Yahweh,<WH3068> in the majesty<WH1347> of the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> his God:<WH430> and they will live,<WH3427> for then he will be great<WH1431> to the ends<WH657> of the earth.<WH776>

He will be our peace<WH7965> when Assyria<WH804> invades<WH935> our land,<WH776> and when he marches<WH1869> through our fortresses,<WH759> then we will raise<WH6965> against him seven<WH7651> shepherds,<WH7462> and eight<WH8083> leaders<WH5257> of men.<WH120>

They will rule<WH7462> the land<WH776> of Assyria<WH804> with the sword,<WH2719> and the land<WH776> of Nimrod<WH5248> in its gates.<WH6607> He will deliver<WH5337> us from the Assyrian,<WH804> when he invades<WH935> our land,<WH776> and when he marches<WH1869> within our border.<WH1366>

The remnant<WH7611> of Jacob<WH3290> will be in the midst<WH7130> of many<WH7227> peoples,<WH5971> like dew<WH2919> from Yahweh,<WH3068> like showers<WH7241> on the grass,<WH6212> that don't<WH6960> wait for man,<WH376> nor wait<WH3176> for the sons<WH1121> of men.<WH120>

The remnant<WH7611> of Jacob<WH3290> will be among the nations,<WH1471> in the midst<WH7130> of many<WH7227> peoples,<WH5971> like a lion<WH738> among the animals<WH929> of the forest,<WH3293> like a young lion<WH3715> among the flocks<WH5739> of sheep;<WH6629> who,<WH5674> if he goes through, treads down<WH7429> and tears in pieces,<WH2963> and there is no one to deliver.<WH5337>
Let your hand<WH3027> be lifted up<WH7311> above your adversaries,<WH6862> and let all of your enemies<WH341> be cut off.<WH3772>
"It will happen in that day,<WH3117>" says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> "That I will cut off<WH3772> your horses<WH5483> out of the midst<WH7130> of you,<WH6> and will destroy your chariots.<WH4818>
I will cut off<WH3772> the cities<WH6145> of your land,<WH776> and will tear down<WH2040> all your strongholds.<WH4013>
I will destroy<WH3772> witchcraft<WH3785> from your hand;<WH3027> and you shall have no soothsayers.<WH6049>
I will cut off<WH3772> your engraved images<WH6456> and your pillars<WH4676> out of your midst;<WH7130> and you shall no more worship<WH7812> the work<WH4639> of your hands.<WH3027>
I will uproot<WH5428> your Asherim<WH842> out of your midst;<WH7130> and I will destroy<WH8045> your cities.<WH6145>
I will execute<WH6213> vengeance<WH5359> in anger,<WH639> and wrath<WH2534> on the nations<WH1471> that didn't<WH8085> listen."
